contentrichtext.text: '''Surfest''' is an annual [[surfing]] [[competition]] held in [[Newcastle, New South Wales]], [[Australia]]. Surfest began in 1985 as an initiative of Newcastle City Council, and at the time, was the world's richest surfing competition. The event runs for thirteen days, and from the 2007 event, will be held at [[Newcastle Stretch|Merewether Beach]], having been held between [[Newcastle Stretch|Newcastle Beach]] and [[Newcastle Stretch|South Newcastle Beach]] in the past. It is Newcastle's only annual international sporting event and attracts more than 200 surfers, with many coming from around the globe. Former winners include local Novocastrian [[Mark Richards (surfer)|Mark Richards]]. It is rumoured that 2008's Surfest will be moved to Merewether for financial reasons. ==See also== * [[Newcastle, New South Wales]] * [[Newcastle Stretch]] ==External links== * [http://www.aspworldtour.com/ Association of Surfing Professionals] * [http://www.surfest.com Surfest] * [http://www.energy.com.au/ Energy Australia] {{Surfing}} [[Category:Surfing competitions]] {{surfing-stub}} [[Category:Surfing in Australia]] [[Category:Sport in Newcastle, New South Wales]]
